channel.title: I need Help Makin a server
channel.description: Please help me, I want to make a server for myself and the public so I can be on the server and own it. I need Help making one. How do I set it up so I can use .no-ip.org?? please help me. If you help me and I get it going Ill pay a runescape account lvl 49 :)

item.title: I need Help Makin a server
item.dc:creator: @Bigsyboy Bigsyboy
item.description:
@Bigsyboy wrote:

where do I click host/redirects?

Read full topic
item.source: I need Help Makin a server

item.title: I need Help Makin a server
item.dc:creator: @masterp00n masterp00n
item.description:
@masterp00n wrote:

1.Go to www.no-ip.com register an account
2.click host/redirects and then click add
3.Type in you server name and hosting type like no-ip.org or servegame.com
4.download no-ip at the top of the pageit says download and you will get it from there
5.start up no-ip if it doesn’t come up there should be a icon on the bottom right corner that shows no-ip right click it then click show
6.you should see your server name there check the box it should blush…if it blushes then you got it right…
7.port forwarding go to www.portforwarding.com and find your router type and then find hamachi and follow the instructions
8.you have signed up no-ip downloaded it port forwarded time to advertise it
9.go to advertiseing section and add you server details
10.click runserver on your source folder…download one if you do not have one already…click run.server ok so your server is now good to go people should be able to loging to your account…
oops which reminds me…you must download java 6 at www.java.sun.com

Read full topic
item.source: I need Help Makin a server
